titleStmt.title: [Desponsacio virginis xpristo. Spousage of a virgin to Christ]
titleStmt.author: Alcock, John, 1430-1500.

notesStmt.note: Title from STC. Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
On B3r: Here endeth an exhortacyon made to relygyous systers..
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
